page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN BODMIN ROAD
page.content: Most of the industries are quite successful for what they do.The firms range from working with diamonds to making fizzy drinks.Kress Power Tools is the newest factory on this industrial estate and R.Whites Soft Drinks is the oldest.The average age of the businesses is 52 years and 4 months.There are not many industries on the estate compared with other parts of Coventry. Half of the workers come to work by car and the average amount of time it takes them to get to work is 21 minutes.Some of the factories need more space to work in for what they do,for example Britra Finish who need twice as much space.All the businesses have enough emergency equipment,for example fire extinguishes and first aid kits.The employees were content with their wage levels.
